products.title: Harper Linen Curtain
products.metadescription: Harper linen curtain in cream. Made to measure from 32.77 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their harper range comes in several soft, almost metallic, shades with a light leafy, fern pattern.
 
 Product id: db-cur1070 fabric colour: linen material: 54% polyester / 46% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes
